[Hugo](https://gohugo.io) is one of the most popular open-source static site generators. Hugo is written in Go.

### Examples

The following science blogs use Hugo as a platform:

* [rOpenSci](https://ropensci.org/blog/) - Open Tools and R Packages for Open Science
* [Research Software Alliance](https://researchsoft.org/)
